Title: Two unidentified Indian men, full length
Alternate Title: Two unidentified Indian women [sic], full length
Creator: Barry, D. F. (David Francis), 1854-1934
Summary: Full length studio portrait of two unidentified Dakota men, wrapped in blankets and wearing fur pieces, standing in front of painted backdrop.
Description: 1 photonegative : glass ; 17 x 11 cm. (6 1/2 x 4 1/4 in.); 1 photoprint ; 16 x 11 cm. (6 x 4 in.)
Is Part Of: C Photo Collection 116. David F. Barry Collection.
Type of Material: Glass negatives.; Photographic prints.; Portrait photographs.; Imaged.; Image
Subject: Dakota Indians--1880-1890.; Indians of North America--Portraits--1880-1890.; Indians of North America--Clothing & dress--1880-1890.; Indians of North America--Men--1880-1890.
